import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import SlimGridMotion from '../components/SlimGridMotion'; const VehicleSignwriting: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Vehicle signwriting images for SlimGridMotion const vehicleImages = Array.from({ length: 21 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/vehicle-signwriting/vehicle${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.6' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.8 }, '-=0.4' ); }, []); const steps = [ { title: 'Arrange a FREE consultation', description: 'For standard vehicles, we use our library of scaled drawings. For off-spec vehicles, pop down to our Kidderminster unit for photos and measurements.', icon: ( ), }, { title: 'Get a FREE quote + mockup', description: 'Send us your logo and our design team will create a visual of how your vehicle could look. Need a logo designed? We can help with that.', icon: ( ), }, { title: 'Approve your order', description: 'After approval, book a slot with our team. We have late night slots on Wednesdays or midday slots on Saturdays. We can also come to you on-site.', icon: ( ), }, { title: 'Order up!', description: 'Bring your vehicle to our unit, or our professional and fully insured installation team will meet you at a location of your choice.', icon: ( ), } ]; const pricingData = [ { vehicle: 'Cars', price: '£200 - £400' }, { vehicle: 'SWB - LWB Vans', price: '£300 - £550' }, { vehicle: 'Luton / Box', price: '£500 - £800' }, ]; const vinylSpecs = [ { label: 'Gloss', value: 'Available in a high gloss or matt finish' }, { label: 'Matt', value: 'Outdoor use, matt or gloss finish. Indoor use, matt finish' }, { label: 'Application', value: 'Wet or dry application, wet for better results as you can reposition easily' }, { label: 'Color', value: 'Printed full colour or cut from a range of coloured vinyl' }, { label: 'Finishes', value: 'Gloss, matt, metallic, reflective, fluorescent, carbon fibre, brushed aluminium, wood effect' }, { label: 'Longevity', value: 'Indoor vinyl lasts 2-3 years. Outdoor vinyl lasts 5-7 years' }, { label: 'Removal', value: 'Heat can be used to remove adhesive vinyl from most surfaces. No damage to paintwork' }, ]; return (
{/* Hero Section - Black */}

Let your vehicle
do the talking

Custom decals allow you turn any text, logo, or graphic into a promotional tool for your business. Get spotted on the road or parked on any job.

How It Works Book FREE Consultation
{/* How It Works Section - White */}

How does it work?

Our vehicle signwriting service comes in a range of styles and sizes to suit your needs

{steps.map((step, idx) => (
{/* Circular Progress Icon */}
{step.icon}

{idx + 1}. {step.title}

{step.description}

))}
{/* Can't Lose Your Vehicle Section - Gray */}

Can not lose your work vehicle for the day?

We have late night application slots on Wednesdays or midday slots on Saturdays.

We will also come to you on-site… Let us do our job, while you are doing yours.

Book a Slot
🚐
Flexible Installation
Late nights • Midday Saturdays • On-site service
{/* ROI Section - Black */}

Signwriting pays for itself

We offer a wide range of graphic options to suit your budget. Vehicle signage is round-the-clock advertising. Since vinyl decals can last for many years, you will not be replacing yours for quite a while.

Whatever goods or services you provide, unique vehicle graphics will put you ahead of the competition and help your brand stand out.

If you compare the cost of £500 signwriting to the cost of any other advertising then there really is no comparison. A vehicle on the road gets seen by thousands of other road users every day, 365 days a year. It is even working whilst you are off the clock.

£500
One-time investment
365
Days advertising per year
1000s
Impressions daily
{/* Pricing Section - White */}

Pricing Guide

Transparent pricing for your vehicle signwriting needs

{pricingData.map((item, idx) => ( ))}
Vehicle Type Price Range
{item.vehicle} {item.price}

Note: Prices vary depending on the complexity of the design and the amount of coverage required.

Get a FREE quote and mockup to see exactly how your vehicle will look before committing.

{/* Magnetic Signs Section - Gray */}
🧲
Magnetic Signs

Need something removable?

Magnetic signs are perfect if you use your vehicle for both work and personal use, or if you need temporary branding.

Simply attach them when you need them and remove them when you do not. Easy to swap between vehicles too.

Ask About Magnetic Signs
{/* Installation Team Section - Black */}

Professional installation team

Our installation team are professional, fully insured, and experienced in working with all types of vehicles. Whether you come to our unit in Kidderminster or we come to you on-site, you can trust us to deliver exceptional results.

✓

Professional

Years of experience with vehicles of all shapes and sizes

🛡️

Fully Insured

Complete peace of mind with comprehensive insurance coverage

🚀

Quality Guarantee

We stand behind our work with a satisfaction guarantee

{/* Types of Customisation Section - White */}

Types of customisation

Choose between printed vinyl for full-colour designs or cut vinyl for clean, professional lettering

{/* Printed Vinyl */}

Printed Vinyl

  • ✓ Full colour printing for complex designs and photos
  • ✓ Perfect for logos with gradients and multiple colours
  • ✓ Can include photographs and intricate graphics
  • ✓ Available in gloss or matt finish
  • ✗ Slightly shorter lifespan than cut vinyl
{/* Cut Vinyl */}

Cut Vinyl

  • ✓ Longest lasting option (5-7 years outdoor)
  • ✓ Sharp, clean edges for professional lettering
  • ✓ Available in 100+ solid colours plus special finishes
  • ✓ Metallic, reflective, and fluorescent options available
  • ✗ Not suitable for complex multi-colour designs
{/* Vinyl Specifications Section - Gray */}

Vinyl specifications

High-quality vinyl designed specifically for vehicle applications

{vinylSpecs.map((spec, idx) => (

{spec.label}

{spec.value}

))}

Easy removal when needed

When it is time to update your branding or sell your vehicle, our vinyl can be removed using heat without damaging the paintwork underneath.

{/* Final CTA Section - Black */}

Ready to get noticed on the road?

Get a free mockup and quote for your vehicle signwriting

Book FREE Consultation Call 01562 227 117
); }; export default VehicleSignwriting;
